pullRequests.title: Add weekly planning and review system
pullRequests.description:
This PR introduces a comprehensive weekly planning system that includes:

- Weekly goal setting sessions
- Weekly review and reflection processes
- Integration with existing daily routines

This will help maintain long-term progress tracking and continuous improvement.

## Changes
- Added `task-5`: Weekly goal setting session
- Added `task-6`: Weekly review and reflection
- Both tasks are high priority to establish the routine

## Testing
- [ ] Verify tasks can be created and tracked
- [ ] Confirm integration with existing morning routine
- [ ] Test weekly scheduling doesn't conflict with other commitments
pullRequests.author: jane-smith

pullRequests.title: Enhanced meal planning with Mediterranean focus
pullRequests.description:
Improve the meal planning task with specific dietary approach and meal prep strategy.

## Changes
- Updated task description to focus on Mediterranean diet
- Added meal prep scheduling (Sundays)
- Increased time estimate to be more realistic

## Benefits
- More structured approach to nutrition
- Better time management with designated prep day
- Healthier food choices with Mediterranean focus
pullRequests.author: john-doe

conflicts.incomingValue: Focus on Mediterranean diet with meal prep on Sundays
conflicts.currentValue: Plan healthy meals with variety and balance

pullRequests.title: Add bathroom renovation project
pullRequests.description:
Expanding home improvement scope to include master bathroom renovation alongside kitchen planning.

## Scope
- New fixtures (vanity, toilet, shower)
- Tile replacement for floors and shower
- Updated lighting and ventilation
- Paint and finishing touches

## Timeline
- Planning: February 2024
- Execution: March 2024
- Budget: $8,000 - $12,000

## Dependencies
- Kitchen renovation timeline (avoid overlap)
- Contractor availability
- Permit requirements
pullRequests.author: jane-smith

pullRequests.title: Seasonal garden planning breakdown
pullRequests.description:
Breaking down the vegetable garden task into seasonal phases for better planning and execution.

## Proposed Changes
- Spring phase: Soil preparation and cool-season crops
- Summer phase: Warm-season crops and maintenance
- Fall phase: Fall crops and garden cleanup
- Winter phase: Planning and preparation for next year

## Benefits
- Better alignment with natural growing cycles
- More manageable task breakdown
- Seasonal budget allocation
- Improved success rates
pullRequests.author: bob-wilson
